message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair.
Let's be practical, Alice. We both lose if this drags on. 55/45 seems fair considering the time pressure.
The tables have turned, Bob. I'm willing to be generous, but this is my final offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. 52.5/47.5 is my final offer.  We need to settle this before inflation eats away at the value.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway. 51/49. Take it or leave it.
